verdict.reasoning: The requirement for automated search functionality to provide a summary of the searched content (Article 6(2)(b) EU AI Act) necessitates geo-specific compliance logic. This is due to the European Commission's guideline on Artificial Intelligence (AI) (2021/1327) that emphasizes the need for 'detailed and transparent explanations' of AI systems' decision-making processes, including summaries of searched content.

regions_affected.requirement_summary: Compliance with Article 6(2)(b) EU AI Act

regulations.name: Article 6(2)(b)
regulations.snippet: Automated search functionality must provide a summary of the searched content.
